mutants.code:
def find_top_k_product(nums, k):
    total_sum = sum(nums)
    probabilities = [num / total_sum for num in nums]
    sorted_nums = sorted(nums, key=lambda x: probabilities[nums.index(x)], reverse=True)
    top_k_nums = sorted_nums[:k]
    product = 2
    for num in top_k_nums:
        product *= num
    return product

def find_top_k_product(nums, k):
    total_sum = sum(nums)
    probabilities = [num / total_sum for num in nums]
    sorted_nums = sorted(nums, key=lambda x: probabilities[nums.index(x)], reverse=True)
    top_k_nums = sorted_nums[:k]
    product = 1
    for num in top_k_nums:
        product /= num
    return product

mutants.mutated_line: sorted_nums = sorted(nums, key=lambda x: probabilities[nums.index(x)], reverse=False)
mutants.code:
def find_top_k_product(nums, k):
    total_sum = sum(nums)
    probabilities = [num / total_sum for num in nums]
    sorted_nums = sorted(nums, key=lambda x: probabilities[nums.index(x)], reverse=False)
    top_k_nums = sorted_nums[:k]
    product = 1
    for num in top_k_nums:
        product *= num
    return product
